<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157457</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2906</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Projects at Work</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekte an der Arbeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projets au travail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projetos no trabalho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetti sul lavoro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγράμματα στην εργασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyectos en el trabajo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit about projects, the process of writing them, includes a template to get started and an assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">projects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit über 
Projekte, der Prozeß des Schreibens sie, schließt eine Schablone 
ein, um begonnen zu erhalten und eine Einschätzung Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive au sujet des 
projets, le processus de l'écriture ils, inclut un descripteur pour 
obtenir commencée et une rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa sobre projetos, o
processo da escrita eles, inclui um molde para começar começada e um
rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva circa i progetti, 
il processo di scrittura loro, include una mascherina per ottenere 
cominciata e una rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα για τα 
προγράμματα, η διαδικασία τους, περιλαμβάνει ένα πρότυπο που 
παίρνει αρχισμένο και μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva sobre proyectos,
el proceso de la escritura ellos, incluye un modelo para conseguir 
comenzada y una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozeß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">projets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">processus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade em linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">projetos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">processo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità in linea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">progetti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">processo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προγράμματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαδικασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">unidad en línea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proyectos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proceso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
